bio: I'm Arinze: a thinker and builder tinkering at the intersection of AI, education, and media. My work lives at the intersection of technology, culture, and entrepreneurship, where I explore how emerging tools reshape how we learn, create, and express ourselves.
I'm especially interested in making powerful ideas and technologies feel human, playful to use, accessible to understand, and meaningful in everyday life.
I'm currently pursuing my MBA at Stanford.
